ESM.desc: A master file for Elder Scrolls

ESP.desc: A plugin file for Elder Scrolls

ESL.desc: A light-marked plugin/master for Elder Scrolls; can do less & doesn't count towards the 255 plugin limit

BSA.desc: A resource file (you probably don't have to mess with these)

OSP.desc: The project file of an outfit, just plain text (XML format). Used to have .xml extension

OSD.desc: The slider data file of the project, contains everything that was once thousands of tiny BSD files
